content.json:
# Azure Data Factory Monitoring Dashboard

This workbook provides comprehensive monitoring for Azure Data Factory and Synapse pipelines.

content.query:
ADFPipelineRun
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize 
    Total = count(),
    Succeeded = countif(Status == "Succeeded"),
    Failed = countif(Status == "Failed"),
    InProgress = countif(Status == "InProgress")
| extend SuccessRate = round(100.0 * Succeeded / Total, 2)
content.title: Pipeline Execution Summary

content.query:
ADFPipelineRun
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by Status
| render piechart
content.title: Pipeline Status Distribution

content.query:
ADFPipelineRun
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), Status
| render timechart
content.title: Pipeline Runs Over Time

content.query:
ADFPipelineRun
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Status == "Failed"
| project TimeGenerated, PipelineName, RunId, ErrorMessage = FailureMessage
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 50
content.title: Recent Failed Pipelines

content.query:
ADFPipelineRun
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Status == "Succeeded"
| extend DurationMinutes = DurationMs / 1000 / 60
| summarize 
    AvgDuration = round(avg(DurationMinutes), 2),
    MaxDuration = round(max(DurationMinutes), 2),
    RunCount = count()
    by PipelineName
| order by AvgDuration desc
content.title: Pipeline Performance Metrics

content.query:
ADFActivityRun
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ActivityType == "Copy"
| where Status == "Succeeded"
| extend DataReadGB = todouble(Output.dataRead) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
| summarize TotalDataGB = round(sum(DataReadGB), 2) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| render timechart
content.title: Data Volume Processed (GB)
